short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool adds new menu items to the Palantir Foundry UI for developers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stable Version
This tool adds new menu items to the Palantir Foundry UI for developers.
Basic features are:
- One click copying the current session-token into the clip-board.
- One click creating a short-live token which gets copied into the clip-board.
- Add your custom links to the menu.
- Customize the host you want to allow.
